meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Graver Jordan Nussbaum Ali Hasan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7790.

div.div: Clip of this game shown in the 2019-04-04 episode of Better Things.

td.p: Amanda Graver, a researcher from Columbus, Ohio
Jordan Nussbaum, a lawyer from Thornhill, Ontario, Canada
Ali Hasan, a secondary school teacher from New Westminster, British Columbia, Canada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $67,801)

tr.td: ROCKS & MINERALS
A LANDMARK DESIGNATION
SURNAMES
"H" TO "H"
OFFICE SUPPLIES
UH OH, TALKIN' MORE FOOTBALL

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
